title: The High Ground
preview: My most important consideration in deciding what to post
body:
Peer pressure is a real thing.

Sometimes it’s a good thing, other times it’s a bad thing, but it’s real.

That pressure by others to conform, to go with the flow, often tends to stifle one’s unique voice. On the other hand, that same pressure is a powerful motivator to exercise proper care in how we speak about others.

I’ve never been one to follow the herd; I prize my uniqueness almost to a fault. However, I know all too well that uniqueness is not an excuse for being rude to others.

These competing forces help me consider what I think is the most important question related to whether I should post something on social media: _Am I prepared to defend this post?_

Alternatively, this question could be phrased as: _Am I willing to stand behind what I write?_

Many things come to mind when I consider this question:

* Who is my expected audience for this post?

* How could this post be reasonably understood by others?

* Have I done enough research on the topic related to the post?

* How much time am I willing to spend discussing this post?

* What objections could people reasonably bring up?

Of course, I could go through this routine and still write something indefensible, but the chances of that happening are a bit lower if I’ve exercised care in what I write and post.

This kind of care is less about popularity and more about credibility. I have little control over how popular I am, but I have considerable control over how credible I appear. That being said, credibility often (but not always) helps with popularity as well.

Holding to the position that I should be able to defend what I write has had one peculiar outcome for me: I look back over my old posts, and I still like what I wrote back then. I stand by what I wrote as much today as I did the day I wrote it. There are probably exceptions to this, but I can’t think of any at the moment.

What are your thoughts? What are the essential elements of a defensible piece of writing or social media post?
